instructions: put the dinner plate down on the bottom middle of the tablecloth
place the dinner fork on the left side of the dinner plate with the tines facing upward
put the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with the tines facing upward
put the dinner knife on the right side of the dinner plate with the blade facing upward
place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with the blade facing upward
place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife with the handle facing downward
place the water glass on the tablecloth above the blade of the dinner knife
place the wine glass on the table to the right of the water glass
place the wine glass to the right of the wine glass
place the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon
place the bread plate upward from the tines of the dinner fork
place the butter knife on the bread plate with its blade facing away from the dinner plate
place the dessert fork upward from the dinner plate, on its side, and with tines to the right
place the dessert spoon upward from the dessert fork with its handle facing to the right
place the napkin on the center of the dinner plate pointing upward
